name: Splash N Dash
description:
Splash N Dash is a platform fighiting game inspired by Smash Bros and Rivals of Aether. I made this as my NEA for my A-Levels computer science project.

This game isn't meant to be very polished due to the small amount of time i had to make this, but i still wanted to upload this because i might as well.

The controls are the same as the default controls in smash bros, without tap jump.

Oh and btw.

PLAY WITH CONTROLLER

I didn't program for this game to be playable with a keyboad, maybe i can change that after I finish my A-level exams.

I also chose to use Godot because a friend of mine recommended it. 

Disclaimer: None of the art or music is mine, music was made by a friend of mine.
